title: 'Get yourself tucked up': Tom Hardy reads Valentine's Day bedtime story on CBeebies | London - ITV News
text:
15 February 2017 at 12:44pm 'Get yourself tucked up': Tom Hardy reads Valentine's Day bedtime story on CBeebies 
Adults across the nation have confessed to switching over to children's TV channel CBeebies to listen to a bedtime story read by Tom Hardy. Sorry, this content isn't available on your device. 
The Hammersmith-born actor delighted viewers as he read Tom McLaughlin's 'The Cloudspotter', a tale about a lonely little boy who makes best friends with a dog. 
In the show broadcast on Valentine's Day, Hardy was joined in his rooftop nook by his own pet dog and "best friend" for a second time after his appearance on the BBC channel in December. 
It's safe to say excitement levels among viewers were soaring.
